installCommand: cd ../.. && npm install && (cd packages/db && npm run clean && npm run build) && npx turbo run build --filter=ui && (cd apps/web && NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS='--max_old_space_size=4096' npm install --legacy-peer-deps)
buildCommand: cd apps/web && NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS='--max_old_space_size=4096' npm run build
